import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Usd = () => { const [state, setstate] = useState({ currency_1 : "", currency_2 : "", input_1 : "" }) const handleUserInput = (event) =>{ const { name , value } = event.target setstate((prevState)=>{ return { ...state, [name] : value } }) } const handleSubmit = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() console.log() } return ( <>
); } export default Usd;
